settings.title: Ubiquiti UniFi Settings
settings.intro: On this page you will be able to see current connection status and adjust the settings of this app.

notice.restart: * If you just want to restart the connection, then click "Apply" again.

debug.title: Debug messages
debug.intro: Up to 100 messages are shown below, in reverse order (newest on top):

alert.changes-saved: Settings saved, connection is being initiated.s
